text: The 2018–19 season was Al-Ahli's 43rd consecutive season in the top flight of Saudi football and 81st year in existence as a football club. Along with the Pro League, the club competed in the King Cup, Arab Club Champions Cup, and the Champions League. The season covers the period from 1 July 2018 to 30 June 2019. ==Players== ===Squad information=== http://www.kooora.com/?team=147&cz;=15887&mode;=p ==Transfers== ===In=== ====Summer==== {|
